name: Galactic Groove (GloopBloop)
description:
Enter the EXPANSIVE WORLD (1 level) of Galactic Groove! Enjoy dodging, hitting enemies with your laser, and NOT! MUCH! MORE!

I made this game to learn Godot (and gamedev in general) and it works! I spent way too much time on the music and way too little time on the art, but rest assured, if I make a larger project I'll get someone else to do the art.

WASD/Arrow Keys to move, you attack when you're not moving! +1 point when you kill an enemy, -1 point when you get hit. Go for a highscore!

Pictocat made the triangle asset lol
